content.question: Write an essay that argues your position on Sandel’s claim that for the common good, citizens should openly address moral disagreements on matters of public policy.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that argues your position on Sandel’s claim that for the common good, citizens should openly address moral disagreements on matters of public policy.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
